ModMetaData.name: ResearchPal
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description:
Smooth painless research # Features - automatically generated to maximize readability*. - shows research projects, buildings, plants and recipes unlocked by each research project. - projects can be queued, and colonists will automatically start the next project when the current research project completes. - search functionality to quickly find research projects. - helptab integration, right click the researches for extra information.
